name: Hamish Linklater
biography: Hamish Linklater was born on July 7, 1976 in Great Barrington, Massachusetts, USA. He is an actor, known for The Big Short (2015), Battleship (2012) and Fantastic Four (2005). He was previously married to Jessica Goldberg.::Anonymous
trivia: Was second-in-line, after Michael Weatherly, to play the part of Logan in James Cameron's Dark Angel (2000).
Daughter, Lucinda Rose, born in April 2007.
Auditioned for the role of "Jim Halpert" in the television series, The Office (2005).
His mother is Scottish and his father was American. His ancestry is Scottish, German, English, Irish, Swedish, and remote Belgian (Flemish).
filmography: 10 Things We Should Do Before We Break Up
